name: Tappy Plane (Intesar Rahman Tajul)
description:
It is a one finger game. I mean it is a game which you can play with only one finger. This game will make you want to play it over and over again once you play it.

The more it seems simple, the more it is complex to earn points.

I am challenging you to earn 100 points. If you can, you are such a complicated player. It is also a game of challenge. People like this types of game mostly. So I have made this game ‘Tappy Plane’.

Thank you!
